name: The Marble Champs are Coming. (Canceled)
blurb: Marble Champs is based on marble games played all over the world by kids, and adults. These games are for smartphones and tablets.

rewards.reward: Completed E-comic #1 Marble Champs,  PDF (Extra 12 Pages than free version).  Marble Champs, Intl and Super MC Wall Papers.  1 App download, via Promo Code, or Gift. Theme Sound Track Mp3

All of the Above ...\r\nCompleted E- Comic #1 Marble Champs, #1 Super Marble Champs.  2 Marble Champs App and 2 Marble Champs International Apps  Gifted Via Itunes or Android. Marble Champs, Marble Champs International. Marble Champs Wallpapers. Game Soundtrack

Completed E- Comic #1 Marble Champs PDF, Super Marble Champs PDF. 5 Apps gifted Via Itunes or Promo Code, or Android Marketplace, for Marble Champs and Marble Champs Intl. 1 Original Artwork posters signed by artist and creator.  Plus all previous rewards. All Game Soundtracks.

Completed E Comic #1-5 Marble Champs PDF Version, #1 Super Marble Champs, Deluxe Wall Paper  PDF. For All three versions 10 Apps Gifted \r\nItunes or Android Marketplace. Creator Signed Poster Original artwork. Marble Champs Tshirts. All E-comics will be sent over as completed. Includes previous extras.

All of the $250 bonuses Completed E Comic #1-5 Marble Champs PDF\r\nSuper Marble Champs, #1-5 PDF,  Wallpapers, Favorite Character, Wallpaper.  All three versions of Marble Champs 5 Apps for all three versions Gifted Via Android or Itunes .  Signed Artwork by Artist and Creator.
All of the above Plus Extras, Your own character as a spectator in App  and/or comic book. Wallpaper designed with your character and the Marble Champs gang, in all three versions of the game.

Be one of the 2 bullies  featured in the e-comic and App. Immortalize yourself as the lucky backer who wants to take one of the roles. Names and faces will be modified in a later upgrade to your specs.  Plus everything the 500 backer gets, plus the poster of your character with the MC gang.  Note, bullies will eventually learn the error of their ways and become friends and fans of the  MC toward the end of the Marble Champs game/comic book series. More bullies will be added in updates.

All extras plus, the Wall of Infamy, be on the list of the 5 worst marble players and bullies of our Marble Champs  mythology going back to the prehistoric, Wild West, Medieval Japan, Rome, and  the roaring 20's era, with a legend storyline in historic style up to the hippie days of the 70's. Each Character will be highlighted in an e comic as our gang progresses through the storyline, and series of apps. This wall of infamy will be in both app and comic version. The comic version will of course have extend storyline to each infamous player. We expect the comic series 1-5 to be completed Early October where the legends will be introduced.

Become Immortalized in the Marble Champs Mount RushMore and Hall of Fame, E-Comic or Series of Apps(3). Be a  legend in the Marble Champs series, with a dedication to your marble playing skills. Your character will be highlighted for deeds long done, in the E-Comic.You will be the character who beat all the infamous characters from the Wall of infamy.  Oh it includes all the above bunch of stuff like posters free downloads wallpapers. Your own character, wallpaper.

Become the mysterious force or alien, and voice in the game, flash video,  who empowers the Marble Champs with Super powers. Designed to look like you and sound like you  .  All extras, Plus the Super Marble Champs Poster signed custom Poster of your character and the MChamps signed by us.

Become a full on new character in the Marble Champs Apps Series (3) and major character in the E-Comic series. Tons of Rewards and updates, input to direction of your character in app and comic book. 20 Gifted Apps on Platform of Choice.\r\nOriginal Artwork, be there from the beginning with a select package of the app as it was being designed and created. May include introductory emails as creator and programmers, and artist started out on this project.
